Title: Bogu's Arbor
Text:
"Nature's blooms, time's trace. A tiny penjing, home's embrace."

[Seasonal Penjing Theme: Moon]

Prompt One: Create a penjing with the theme of "Fireflies Sea and the Moon";

Prompt Two: Create a penjing with the theme of "The Peach Haven in the Central Plains and the Moon";

Prompt Three: Create a penjing with the theme of "Clawless Loong".
